thread.title: Salman Khan Is “Committed” To Working With Akshay Kumar And Karan Johar
thread.title_full: Salman Khan Is “Committed” To Working With Akshay Kumar And Karan Johar

title: Salman Khan Is “Committed” To Working With Akshay Kumar And Karan Johar
text: facebook 661 SHARES Notorious Mr. Khan has a way with tweets (like It’s my way or the highway, or No way! He said that?). On a recent visit to Twitter land, his dramatic choice of words helped take the load off an allegation. Apparently, it had been reported that Salman Khan shelved a project that he was slated to produce in collaboration with Karan Johar, and with Akshay Kumar in the lead. Another “alleged” information involved actor-director, Ajay Devgan, where he had approached Salman to shut the project since he was carrying out a movie on a similar subject (on the Battle of Saragarhi, allegedly again). To make matters decidedly filmy, the self-proclaimed bhai, decided to land on his firm stand with this heavyweight tweet. Don't follow rumors . follow me . ek baar jo maine commitment kar di toh phir vry much doing film with @akshaykumar — Salman Khan (@BeingSalmanKhan) March 12, 2017
